tasks.name: Task 1 - Setup Project
tasks.description: Initialize repository, configure Nuxt 4 project, and install dependencies.

tasks.name: Task 2 - Design Layout
tasks.description: Create base layout and navigation structure for the app using <NuxtPage />.

tasks.name: Task 3 - Build Authentication
tasks.description: Implement user login and registration using Pinia store for user state.

tasks.name: Task 4 - API Integration
tasks.description: Connect frontend components with backend API endpoints in /server/api.

tasks.name: Task 5 - Setup CI/CD
tasks.description: Configured GitHub Actions for automatic testing and deployment.
